idea:
Smartify World - is a product startup having its focus on creating smarter organizations. SmartCore focuses on making facilities and manufacturing processes smart.
SmartCore-Buildings and SmartCore-Manufacturing uses IOT and AI to improve efficiency, sustainability, cost and profits.
Vision – Develop innovative technologies for achieving cyber physical transformation of things.
Mission – To create connected organizations and responsive spaces.
Products – SmartCore-Building(SC-B), SmartCore-Manufacturing(SC-M)
name: Smartify World

idea:
Orison Oilfield services is a diversified group to meet the growing demand of Professional
service in the oilfield. Orison Oilfield services represents world renowned experts in the
oilfield and other sectors. We know that no compromise is acceptable.
The supply of equipment and services are in compliance with international regulatory
standards.
We as Orison fully understand your quick and sometimes urgent need for equipment and / or
consumables. To serve you the best and quickest way we keep a certainement amount of our
consumables in stock as well as different types of equipment ready to be sold or rented out
for short temporary jobs.
OUR SERVICES INCLUDES…
 Solid control and drilling waste management solutions.
 Refurbishing of centrifuges and pumps.
 Brine filtration services.
 Mobile Effluent treatment plant.
 All Machining, Engineering & Fabrication works.
 Basic offshore safety training. (B.O.S.E.T approved.)
 Certified safety Audit.
 Mud lab container supply (with accommodation or without)
 Mud lab Equipment supply /service
name: Orison Oilfield Services
